body: This is a mozilla-central bug ([bug 1375633](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1375633)). As a workaround (and, I think, an okay long-term change) I'm going to just switch our tests to use xpcshell-test and mochitest mach commands directly, since that's apparently how other automation is running these tests.
